v8:item.v8:content: The column displays an action (write off, receive, or return) or a document if it is issued. Write off is displayed if there is inventory by accounting data but no actual inventory, or there is shortage. Receive is displayed by default if there is no inventory by accounting data but there is actual inventory or surplus. Return is displayed if the action is set manually. Transfer is not prompted. However, you can create a document based on the physical inventory count and add the required inventory manually using the Copy, Paste commands.
